duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve individual sales goals and contribute to the overall store success by delivering exceptional customer experiences and driving sales.
Style and wardrobe each customer based on their needs, setting the example for customer engagement that exceeds industry standards.
Build client relationships and generate excitement about the product through client outreach.
Assist with non-selling operational tasks including replenishing stock, maintaining organization of the store stockroom, and executing sales and promotions.
Maintain a neat, clean, and well-presented store, and support scheduling needs of the business.
Ensure Loss Prevention awareness to protect the store from internal and external loss, and adhere to company policies and procedures, standards and practices.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years of related professional sales experience in specialty or luxury retail and/or customer service experience
